cssTag: :root{--linkSize: 20%}.c-account-nav{position:relative;width:fit-content}.js .c-account-nav--hide{display:none;visibility:hidden}.c-account-nav__anchor{color:#0070a8}.c-account-nav__anchor:hover{color:#0070a8;outline:0;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-color:#0070a8;text-decoration-thickness:3px}.c-account-nav__anchor:focus{color:#0070a8;outline:3px solid #fece3e;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-color:#0070a8;text-decoration-thickness:3px}.c-account-nav__anchor:visited{color:#0070a8}.c-account-nav__anchor span{display:inline-block;margin:0 4px;content:url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg id='icon-chevron-up' viewBox='0 0 10 10' height='14' width='14' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath d='m5.58578644 4-3.29289322-3.29289322c-.39052429-.39052429-.39052429-1.02368927 0-1.41421356s1.02368927-.39052429 1.41421356 0l4 4c.39052429.39052429.39052429 1.02368927 0 1.41421356l-4 9)'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");transform:rotate(180deg)}.c-account-nav__menu{font-family:"Merriweather Sans","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;border:1px solid #999;box-sizing:border-box;padding:0;position:absolute;top:100%;margin:4px 0 0 0;z-index:10;list-style:none;max-width:300px;min-width:250px;color:#666;line-height:1.625}.c-account-nav__menu::after{content:"";display:block;position:absolute;bottom:99%;width:5px;height:5px;border-top:1px solid #999;border-left:1px solid #999;transform:rotate(45deg);background-color:#ebf1f5}.c-account-nav__menu li:first-of-type{padding-top:16px}.c-account-nav__menu li:last-of-type{padding-bottom:16px}.c-account-nav__menu--right{left:auto;right:0}.c-account-nav__menu--left{left:0;right:auto}.c-account-nav__menu--chevron-right::after{right:6px}.c-account-nav__menu--chevron-left::after{left:20%;left:var(--linkSize)}.c-account-nav__menu-header{background-color:inherit;font-size:.9em;font-family:"Merriweather Sans","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;display:block;text-decoration:none;font-weight:normal;padding:16px;margin:0;border-bottom:1px solid #999;background:#ebf1f5;overflow-wrap:break-word}.c-account-nav__menu-item{background-color:#fff;font-size:.9em;width:100%;display:block;box-sizing:border-box;text-decoration:none;display:list-item;padding:8px 16px}.c-account-nav__menu-item a{color:#0070a8}.c-account-nav__menu-item a:hover{color:#0070a8;outline:0;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-color:#0070a8;text-decoration-thickness:3px}.c-account-nav__menu-item a:focus{color:#0070a8;outline:3px solid #fece3e;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-color:#0070a8;text-decoration-thickness:3px}.c-account-nav__menu-item a:visited{color:#0070a8}
